thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com
thread.title: Sally

author: Sally
title: Sally
text: Can't fault it. Will definitely be looking for other adventures with Poseidon and have recommended it to lots already. The ship was lovely and so comfortable, the crew were all brilliant both the ship crew and the expedition crew. I had so much trust in their expertise and professionalism. I was kayaking and there was one day only when I felt they were being over-cautious but I guess I had to accept that they had our safety uppermost. Lastly, learnt so much from their lectures.
